allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Cover Letter Generator with Supabase + Vercel

Features:
- AI-powered cover letter generation with Claude
- Email/password authentication via Supabase
- Profile and document management
- Cover letter feedback analysis
- AI phone interview feature with Vapi
- Server-side API routes via Vercel

Tech stack: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, Vercel
EOF
\)")
